Brilliant Earth: Ava here, your jewelry specialist. The 18K Yellow Gold Aimee Open Double Band Solitaire Ring is waiting in your cart. Complete your purchase now: brilliantearth.attn.tv/aF5rYFPvTCIT .

Have any questions?
Yes is the double ring a considered a low profile ring?

Brilliant Earth: Thank you for reaching out! In a low setting places the diamond is placed closer to the finger, creating a more subtle and secure profile. This style is often favored by those with active lifestyles or professions that require frequent use of their hands, since the diamond is less exposed to accidental knocks. Low settings are also practical for stacking with straight wedding bands, as the lower profile allows the two rings to sit neatly together. While the sparkle may appear less intense compared to higher settings, low settings provide excellent durability and everyday comfort.

send_to_cs: Shipping inquiries on a current order
For product or general inquiries you can't find the answer to, use PGI shortcut
escalate: No escalations for this client, send everything to CS
tone: Don't use the word "unfortunately" to discuss our appointment structure
Don't use the word "best" to reference a product (e.g., best ring, etc.)
templates: If cx are looking for an engagement ring and don't provide specifics, use LER shortcut
dos_and_don_ts: If the customer responds incorrectly to the journey, don't send jny temp, recommend items based on their selection instead
Cx can create their own engagement ring on the webiste by choosing a setting, stone and size
Cx can customize rings by working with designers who will use their ideas, drawings, images to create the ring they want
Don't disclose the locations of their labs/production facilities
drive_to_purchase: Be MORE SALESY, if the customer is showing intent to purchase then:
âžœ Ask open-ended general questions such as style & material
âžœ After asking open-ended questions, transition to specific questions such as center stone, etc.
âžœ If the customer liked our recommendation, push for the sale by asking about payment options or when they hope to have the item
promo_and_promo_exclusions: Please see here for current offer details: https://www.brilliantearth.com/promo-codes-and-offers/

Surebonder: For a heat-resistant option, consider using our 4588R510 Full Size 10" Polyamide High Strength Amber Glue Sticks. Check it out here: https://surebonder.attn.tv/aAn2lypoSVfN
are you AI or a real sales person?
does this come in clear color?
Surebonder: The 4588R510 glue sticks are amber. For clear options, consider our Clear Stik glue sticks: https://surebonder.attn.tv/aFxc46eSpA8U
what is the temperature it can with hold without melting off?
Surebonder: The 4588R510 Polyamide Glue Sticks can withstand temperatures up to 300Â°F, making them suitable for high-temperature applications.
okay perfect ty
just to be clear this is the glue that can with stand the temperature up to 300 degrees of heat?
hello

Surebonder: Thanks for asking! Upon checking, I can confirm that the Clear Stik 4" Full Size All Purpose Hot Glue Sticks can withstand temperatures up to 380Â°F. 

I hope this helps. Please let me know how I can assist you further today, I'm just a text away!

https://pgs.attn.tv/aO-pFyG3XLOw
PA General Store: Don't miss out: Add us as a contact to your phone to access exclusive content first!
PA General Store: Get ready to shamrock and roll! Your fave Irish Potatoes are back! Grab yours before they vanish like a pot of gold! pgs.attn.tv/aQAHg-L7FLjb

PA General Store: Act fast! Your 10% off offer code, WLCM10, is waiting to be used on your next purchase. Don't miss out!

https://pgs.attn.tv/a4L8MwmpcOnx
PA General Store: Thanks for texting us! If you have additional questions please reach us at customerservice@pageneralstore.com or you can call us at 800-545-4891.
Where is my order

PA General Store: Thank you for your purchase! Could you let me know when you placed your order and if you received any tracking info? Sometimes our emails can end up in your spam or promo folder, so please check there as well!
Thank you. The order was placed on 2/14/2026. Never received a tracking number, I checked my credit card and it was charged. The email it was placed under was leo.p.foley@gsk.com.

PA General Store: I appreciate the details! I'm really sorry for the concern this has caused, especially seeing the charge on your card. Did you happen to receive a confirmation email after placing the order on 2/14/2026? Sometimes it can land in your spam or promotions folder, so it's definitely worth a quick check there as well. If you did receive it, could you please share the order number with me? Also, can you let me know if the charge on your card is still pending or if it has fully posted?
Charge is not pending and I will check with spam. Did you see any order under Leo Foley?

PA General Store: I'm afraid I don't see an order on my end. All orders will ship within 1-3 business days unless you schedule a later date. If you need delivery on a specific date, we recommend using 2 Day or UPS Next Day Air Shipping methods.

Well how do I get a credit on my credit card, if you don't see an order.  I find it odd regardless of how it got shipped an order should at least be seen. I can call with a credit card reference number if you need it.
PA General Store: My sincere apologies for the inconvenience! I'll be more than happy to check this with my team for you. Can I also have your shipping address, please?
No email was sent any where.

603 west burr oak drive 
Arlington Heights , Illinois  60004
This is the address and it was sent to Michael McGuigan
Thank you
PA General Store: Thanks for sending that over, and you're welcome! Let me check on this with the team and let you know as soon as I hear back.
Should I call anyone or call my credit card company?

PA General Store: I completely understand your concern. At this point, we're already reviewing this with our team and will update you as soon as we have more information. It's entirely your choice if you'd like to reach out to your credit card company in the meantime, but we'll let you know right away if any action is needed on your end.
